channel.title: Understanding Network Analytics on Security365 Docs
channel.description: Recent content in Understanding Network Analytics on Security365 Docs

item.title: Concepts
item.description: Concepts ​​ Adaptive Bit Rate sampling With Adaptive Bit Rate (ABR) sampling, every analytics query that supports ABR will be calculated at a resolution matching the query. Depending on the size of your query, the ABR mechanism will choose the best sampling rate and fetch a response from one of the sample tables encapsulated behind each Network Analytics v2 node. The cardinality and accuracy are preserved even for historical data.

item.title: Main dashboard
item.description: Main dashboardThe following sections are a guide on the different sections of the main Network Analytics dashboard. ​​ High-level metrics The side panels in the Network Analytics page provide a summary of activity over the period selected in the timeframe drop-down list. Clicking one of the metrics in the sidebar will define the base unit (packets or bits) for the data displayed in the Network Analytics dashboard. ​​ Filters Under Network Analytics you can apply filters to the data displayed in the dashboard.
